body: Responsibilities:-Responsible for creating the banners used by the Marketing team, based on the brief offered by the team;-Sets together with his/her superior the necessary number of banners per day, the visual structure, the pictures and the level of communication of the brand through photo and graphic images ;-Collaborates with  the whole creative Team for realizing high quality images according to FD standards and guidelines and also with the brand;makes suggestions for improving banners;-Constant relationship with Campaign Production; -Correct completing and in time delivery of KPI-S;-Respecting time limit and makes suggestions regarding time frames;-Works fast in stress conditions;-Works with colleagues form whole department, also from FD and solves the requests from Manager.Profile:-Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator – advanced;-English -advanced;-Intelligent and creative, intuitive, curious;-Modern and young in spirit, behavior and lifestyle; free-thinking;Creative.-Communicative; -Working well within a team
title: Graphic Designer
locations: Bucuresti sector 6, București, Municipiul București, România
